website_summaries.verdict: This model offers the portability and compatibility that roll up keyboard users want in a model with superior durability to most keyboards in the category.
pros: The keyboard is made of lightweight, flexible silicone
Allows users to easily roll the keyboard up and store it on the go, without adding too much weight
Compatible with virtually all modern operating systems
Plug and play simplicity of use means no need to download drivers
Users report the ability to use and fold this keyboard frequently with much less loss of functionality than other keyboards
cons: The slightly modified layout of the keyboard requires an adjustment period on the part of the user

customer_reviews.title: Revived Review
customer_reviews.text: 3 months later - Dead as a Doornail .....I totally love the concept, but very poor quality. Back to my old trusty clunker ;) *** I had to update my review. It seems that I had a small malfunction of some sort, but after rebooting and disconnecting the unit, it is now working without issue. I really do like the keyboard - Ultra Quiet and Responsive. Now lets hope we do not experience any other malfunctions with the keyboard, because its really hard to go back to my old clunker or any standard keyboard after this jewel.
customer_reviews.author: MasterDon

customer_reviews.title: For that Co worker with heavy fingers
customer_reviews.text: The keys are extremely sensitive. The keyboard itself i awesome but takes some getting used to as the keys are much farther apart than a usual keyboard. Highly recommended if you or someone bothering you with loud, heavy key strokes. Its nice that it is waterproof the only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is because of the sensitivity and the lack of a back light on the keys (but i knew that going in) Absolutely worth the money and the most portable keyboard you will find.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not a primary keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this as my main keyboard to use. As others have probably said, the keys have an interesting sensitivity where you would have to double check if you actually hit the key or not. I use this as a portable keyboard for plugging into a server or a laptop when I need to, so I don't use this very frequently compared to my main keyboard. It also seems like you will need to be careful with this keyboard as it has a disclaimer to "not twist", which I don't think I want to test. I do like the layout of keys and the look of it, and it works pretty well for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rust

customer_reviews.title: Unnusssaaaabbbblleee kkkeeeeebbbooaaardd
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt at finding a decent silicone keyboard. The first one I tried wasn't bad, but it cut my typing speed in half. This one uses a different key layout, so I was cautiously optimistic the keys would be more responsive. They're responsive all right. Not only does it respond quickly to every button press, but it keeps responding to each button press. Nearly every letter is repeated. Yes, I could use my computer's usability settings to adjust the key response rate - but that would introduce other problems, and it would slow down my typing.
customer_reviews.author: A voracious reader

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Expected
customer_reviews.text: It lasted a few months before half of the keyboard farthest from the cable started to go. It still works, but I have to jam extra hard on that side to get the keys to register. As well as frequently going back to edit my text. I don't think there is a way around this. Otherwise, I really enjoy the feel of the keys when pressed, and how quiet it is. When it was new, the keys are surprisingly responsive. Just make sure you hit the right part of the space bar. I used it in my office at my desk, so it received moderate to high use.
customer_reviews.author: HZ

customer_reviews.title: Good size maybe 80% of a regular keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Product works well right out of the box. No key issues and keys seem to work no matter where I hit them. Good size maybe 80% of a regular keyboard, I will update the review if needed. Only comment I would make is that the product comes in a YUMQUA box but the product itself is a Chin Fai keyboard which is another product that is sold individually on Amazon. To me that makes the reviews a bit skewed. That is why I rated it a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Blinky

customer_reviews.title: another way to type - soft, flexible, small
customer_reviews.text: This has really worked for me for traveling because it's so flexible and small when needing to be packed. I tend not to roll it up because it can take a bit to unfold all the way. I also love the silent typing result - feels good to ears and fingers:) One draw back: really only works on hard surface so my tendency to want to work with keyboard on my lap or a pillow has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Eos

customer_reviews.title: junk, pure junk
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard does not work properly when brand new... several of the keys didn't work right out of the box.. and today it goes in the trash because some keys don't register at all... and others type 2-3 times for every time you hit a key. It is impossible to type on this and the product is useless.
customer_reviews.author: DanInSoCalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Picture could use some more details
customer_reviews.text: A little different than normal keyboards in the sense that the keys are either exchanged for others or missing altogether. Great overall. Happy with purchase. Does not make any noise when typing. The white bottom was not expected. I was disappointed that it wasn't a clear base. Green electrical wire design on the white base is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Velez

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this key board for a little over a month and only for 3 days a week. At first it was great but now it is broken. The 7,8, and 9 buttons on the side number pad have already stopped working. I do a lot of accounting work, so it really messes up the flow to have to reach over to the numbers above the letter keys.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: My kids spilled their drinks and cereal on my last two keyboards, so now they use this one. Its a great investment if you have kids and don't want to keep buying conventional ridged keyboards. I love Its low profile and quiet soft keys, they took a bit to get used to at first since i'm used to clunky noisy keyboards. Even if you don't need one now, these make a nice compact back up if you ever find yourself in a pinch and you find your keyboard swimming in some cheerios and milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement for a previous flexible keyboard. I travel a lot with work...and am just too old school to get used to using the tiny laptop keyboards. This is a full-size keyboard with number pad. The typing is different than a standard keyboard, but I love having it with me on client site. I would recommend keeping the box it arrives in and only storing it in the box. I tried to get fancy with my earlier keyboard; these are fragile and cannot withstand pressure in your work bag or carryon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabilities
customer_reviews.text: My dad has lost most use of his hands because of an accident and has ruined multiple keyboards due to coffee spills. This keyboard works great and has survived each one so far. The spacing is nice and the contrast makes for less mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HappyinSouthernNH
customer_reviews.text: I am on the phone and typing all day but found that the sound of my keyboard was really distracting. This was a perfect way to make that distraction go away. So happy about how quiet this keyboard is. I ended up getting a laptop holder/portable desk so that it was elevated and didn't move around. The only negative is that the shift and return keys are smaller so that causes a lot of typos for me. I can type really fast and this hasn't slowed me down too much. Wish it was a little bigger and that's the reason for the 4 stars. Otherwise, a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have as a backup keyboard at home or to take when traveling. It was fine for the first couple months. Now about 50% of the letters do not work. Making the keyboard useless. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepdevil

customer_reviews.title: waterproof kerning spacing operands work fn not in the middle of function keys
customer_reviews.text: the spacing is better than a normal 104 key, it needs likely a book or something under after using my ms 4000, but I am trying to use it because I can wash it in a sink rinse. operands work fn not in the middle of function keys
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Solheim

customer_reviews.title: Very responisve
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how responsive it was. It is a great keyboard, whether it is flexible or not. And a great price. It will travel wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: OzzyC

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 weeks of use. The CTRL, ALT, and delete buttons stopped working and the spacebar was very sporadic as to when it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Silent
customer_reviews.text: I needed a silent keyboard and didn't want to spend a lot. This fits the bill. It takes getting used to typing on a flat surface. So far,I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: but these seem to hold up better. So far
customer_reviews.text: A little more pricey than a few other flexible keyboards we have tried, but well worth the $3 or $4 more. Other flexible keyboards we have tried in a very extreme outdoor environment have not lasted very long, but these seem to hold up better. So far, we are satisfied with the product. Easy to wash, and ready to use anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Emens

customer_reviews.title: Too touchy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking keyboard, but too touchy. Couldn't type with out 2-3 of each letter showing up on the screen. Too bad, because types comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Came in a high quality box like something from Ikea, simple and straightforward. Product works as intended for my raspberry pi. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dezarn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, nice and quiet. And I do not have to worry about food or anything getting under the keys.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I like it's portability and ease if use
customer_reviews.text: I like it's portability and ease if use, with the exception that it's too easy for double characters and spaces to occur.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: it's a wonderful water tight design just wish it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift for my son, it's a wonderful water tight design just wish it was a little larger. It's harder to use of you have large hands.
customer_reviews.author: T Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. But the all the keys wouldn’t work. It has been shipped back today.
customer_reviews.author: Plowgal

customer_reviews.title: Already have issues with this keyboard: Depending on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Already have issues with this keyboard: Depending on the letters, they get typed twice automatically or not at all. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: BKN

customer_reviews.title: Repeats Letters
customer_reviews.text: When typing it repeats letters as you type. I tried to adjust the settings but it was no use.
customer_reviews.author: WS Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Soft Deluxe Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Keyboard, Easy to clean, soft buttons and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: I use K&N air Filter replacement in my Truck, ATV Side by Side, 4 Wheeler ATV and the filters are Great!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard that is better than most I have had over the years.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Keyboard that is better than most I have had over the years. Fully functioning 101-key keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Beckman

customer_reviews.title: ... to a monitor an laptop combination and it work great!!
customer_reviews.text: I added this to a monitor an laptop combination and it work great !!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. Not all keys are functional. Awaiting a replacement. Currently not happy...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keys stop working
customer_reviews.text: Certain keys stopped working after a few uses. Would have been very helpful if this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jmv

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for 2 weeks now - so far so good. It takes a bit of getting used to but worth it - no ghosts of lunch crumbs past haunting my keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Lily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for family with smaller grimy and sometimes food laden hands! Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: whidby boy

customer_reviews.title: Cute - Not Completely Functional!
customer_reviews.text: One week, or not even, the keys 0, 1, 2, 3 on the numeric keypad stopped working. I am not really sure if they worked to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: blkspin

customer_reviews.title: epic
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The keyboard feels nice to the touch and you can't go wrong with this help item
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah M.

customer_reviews.title: S key broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Used this product at work so that I can clean my keyboard much easier than a normal keyboard. Worked for 5 months and then the s key stopped working. It sits at my desk all day so it's not like I roll it up all the time. Super lame.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: When I first got it it was amazing,
customer_reviews.text: Keys don't work anymore, and you have to press really hard on it. When I first got it it was amazing, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient travel keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to longevity, but at first blush this is a great product. It works just as it should...even though I have a device that it isn't certified to work with. All it really takes is knowing how to plug in a cable...and viola! The keys are responsive, thought the whole thing feels a bit 'funny' due to being soft silicon instead of hard plastic. Once I had it connected and used it for five minutes, those differences faded out. It's not something I'd choose to use for 10 hours a day, but for a travel keyboard to use with my larger tablets it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Flonkbob

customer_reviews.title: It's a wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Find... I used it and it travels well. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cevin D. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Been having for months and play world of warcraft religiously ...
customer_reviews.text: Been having for months and play world of warcraft religiously and still not a single problem my pregnant fiancee said this was a god send lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for air travel. Can be folded very small and 10-key is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received it very quick and it is awesome. Very quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... exactly what it was supposed to do at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it was supposed to do at a good price. I am going to replace all my key boards with theses.No more sticking keys from dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love having a keyboard that is portable but some of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love having a keyboard that is portable but some of the keys do not work, so it defeats the purpose of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Powell Jr

customer_reviews.title: CRAP
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 0 stars. Piece of SH**. Most of the keys quit working after about 3 weeks (didn't even use it much either, they just don't work). Once a single key goes out a keyboard is useless, let alone 15 keys. I am meticulous about the care of my possessions and I guarantee you I did absolutely nothing to harm this thing. I am anal about my stuff. This thing is junk. Unfortunately for me the return policy sucks and I can't return it. HUGE WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Klassy

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the other poor reviews.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the keyboard, I was quite impressed by it. Then the keypad failed and ever ytime I'd hit the num lock, the five key was constantly depressed. If you're a gambler, by all means, buy this. If you want a robust keyboard that will work as expected, you might want to keep looking. The one I got lasted from Monday to Thursday.
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - also great for travel. Small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hollis

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard had keys that stopped working after only a ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard had keys that stopped working after only a month. Also the keys are not very sensitive and makes it hard to type with any proficiency. Invest into something else.
customer_reviews.author: Favabeans

customer_reviews.title: lemon
customer_reviews.text: At first, the keyboard would fail to register keystrokes or add extra ones. Soon thereafter, it failed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muzyka
